title: Allianz Ayudhya returns to PEACH for Agencies Leader Seminar 2015
text:
Allianz Ayudhya returns to PEACH for Agencies Leader Seminar 2015 Allianz Ayudhya returns to PEACH for Agencies Leader Seminar 2015 Details Category: Venues & Events Created on Friday, 17 July 2015 13:30 Over 800 delegates of Allianz Ayudhya Assurance PCL gathered at the award-winning Pattaya Exhibition And Convention Hall (PEACH) for its annual Agencies Leader Seminar on July 11 -12, 2015. Presided during the opening ceremony were Mr. Bryan Smith, President & Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Vithaya Charnpanich, Chief Agency Officer along with 2 successful agency leaders, Ms. Natsarisa Thatsiribunchira and Ms. Ommatra Mahasethakul. Delegates were guided through Allianz Ayudhya’s brand history, overall company performance, missions, future prospects, and was updated on the business direction and initiatives. 
The 2-day event was a remarkable success as it was packed with instructive courses, motivational presentations and group meetings conducted by keynote speakers that focused on great leaders and excellent recruitment. Delegates also had a great opportunity to get together and relax over a delicious buffet which featured international cuisine at the cocktail party hosted at PEACH under the theme “German Funfest”. “We are delighted that Allianz Ayudhya decided to return to PEACH once again to host their prestigious seminar in 2015.” Mr. Vitanart Vathanakul, Executive Director of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group said. “PEACH is the best MICE destination outside of Bangkok that has state-of-the-art facilities backed by a professional team that relentlessly works to support all kinds of business needs. My team and I hope to welcome back executives and delegates of Allianz Ayudhya in the many years to come.” As part of Royal Cliff’s green initiatives, Mr. Antonello Passa, General Manager of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group presented the “Tree Planting Certificate” along with flame trees to representatives of Allianz Ayudhya. The certificate is awarded to organizations that opt to have their event at the Royal Cliff and PEACH. Flame trees would be planted in vital locations on behalf of these organizations. PEACH is a world-class multipurpose award winning convention facility under the flagship of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group. The highly rated convention centre is the perfect venue to hold any kind of event, and is able to accommodate up to 10,062 people theatre-style. For a truly remarkable and memorable event experience, PEACH offers an ideal location, modern facilities and professional services to host a wide variety of engagements including international conferences, product launches, concerts, exhibitions, incentives, grand wedding celebrations and banquets.
